Question.Subject: anyone help me my bbc i player says not enough broadwith to stream programe what does that mean?
Question.Content: if u can help ill give you best anser thank you!!!!! (its really bugging me) and what can i do to fix this problem?
Question.ChosenAnswer: It means your internet connection is not fast enough. Either someone is hogging the line, or you just have poor internet, if you have a wireless connection, try moving closer to your router or setting up a wired connection.

Answer.Content: It means your internet connection is not fast enough. Either someone is hogging the line, or you just have poor internet, if you have a wireless connection, try moving closer to your router or setting up a wired connection.
